001.name: Weak Health Potion
001.description: It's practically water at this point.

101.name: Ye Olde Bent Wooden Spoon
101.description: How did you even manage to bend a wooden spoon?

201.name: Paper Bag
201.description: If I can't see them, they can't see me, right?

301.name: Ominous Fluid
301.description: Foul smelling, foul looking, foul tasting... wait, why did you taste it?!
